context: Hi. Wanna see a war movie like Black Hawk Down (2002)
Nope. I want to see an animation. I like The Boxtrolls (2014), but I'm up for suggestions.
OK I really liked Ferdinand (2017) and I don't normally watch animated stuff!
Then go back to your childhood! What's Ferdinand (2017) about?
Oh, no, I am selective as an adult for example I loved The Secret Life of Pets (2016) ! Ferdinand was a peaceful bull who didn't want to fight and of course in Spain all bulls fight
The Secret Life of Pets (2016) sounds more interesting than Ferdinand (2017).
resp: Different vibe! Both are good. I also liked Finding Nemo (2003) and Shreck (1990)

context.content: Hi there! Do you have a preference for a specific type of movie or show?
I love thrilling and adrenaline-pumping action movies, exciting and daring adventure movies, and magical and enchanting fantasy movies. Do you have any recommendations for me?
context.feelings: I'm curious to see what kind of movies the recommender will suggest based on my preferences. I hope they recommend something thrilling, exciting, and magical. Let's see what they come up with.

context.content: Based on your preferences, I recommend "Thor" for its thrilling action, daring adventure, and enchanting fantasy elements.
Wow, "Thor" sounds interesting! Can you tell me more about the thrilling action, daring adventure, and enchanting fantasy elements in the movie?
context.feelings: I'm excited to learn more about "Thor" and see if it meets all my preferences. The recommender seems to understand my love for thrilling action, daring adventure, and enchanting fantasy. I appreciate the recommendation and look forward to finding out more about the movie.

context.content: "Thor" is packed with thrilling action sequences, especially when Thor battles his enemies using his mighty hammer. The movie also takes you on a daring adventure as Thor is banished to Earth and must find a way to reclaim his power. Additionally, the enchanting fantasy elements are showcased through the magical realms of Asgard and the cosmic powers of the characters.
"Thor" sounds like it has everything I'm looking for in a movie! The thrilling action, daring adventure, and enchanting fantasy elements all sound amazing. I can't wait to watch it. [END]
context.feelings: I'm excited about the thrilling action and enchanting fantasy elements in "Thor." The daring adventure of Thor's journey also sounds intriguing. The recommender did a great job explaining the movie's elements. I'm looking forward to watching it.

simulator_dialog.resp: Different vibe! Both are good. I also liked Finding Nemo (2003) and Shreck (1990)
